title: Being in a constant search for interesting platforms to analyze the cryptocurrency market, we were inspired to create our own platform that would combine the best technical solutions
Gathered a team of like-minded people and attracted the first investment to develop the future platform.
Got the first beta test results from the community. Developing an economic model of our product. Approval of tokenomics. Preparation of alpha version of the product.
Launching the product to the public. Launch of $INVI ecosystem token trading. Launch of marketing program. Mass adoption.
